class.name: PIXI.ColorMatrixFilter
class.help: The ColorMatrixFilter class lets you apply a 4x4 matrix transformation on the RGBA\ncolor and alpha values of every pixel on your displayObject to produce a result\nwith a new set of RGBA color and alpha values. It's pretty powerful!

public.name: syncUniforms
public.help: Syncs the uniforms between the class object and the shaders.

public.name: matrix
public.help: Sets the matrix of the color matrix filter
